MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH16 postcode area of Edinburgh. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.11AM on 24th February 2021.
